name: Goblin and Coins
description: Run and jump, collect coins, confront enemies and avoid traps, open gates and find secret stashes. It's a simple 2D platformer with a twist: You're not a hero from the castle about to slay an evil dragon, you're a goblin cook working for the dragon! It starts slowly but things get more and more complicated as you go.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Memory: 768 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Game is locked to 30 fps.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: A nice old school 'run and jump' platformer that reminds you of some old times, when all you needed were cute graphics, responsive controls and simple gameplay.

A cute little retro looking 2D Platformer to remind you of the good old simpler times of gaming, it's enough for the price it asks for, a couple hours of fun and challenging gameplay, sometimes will have you rage and repeat till you get over your obstacles.  7/10
